title: NRA Previews Chapter 11 Strategy Against ‘Hostile’ New York
sub_head: The gun-rights organization is making its debut appearance in a Texas bankruptcy court while facing a legal challenge in New York
body:
The National Rifle Association said it took refuge in bankruptcy court due to partisan legal efforts in New York to put it out of business, but that it isn’t seeking to block that litigation from progressing.
In court papers filed early Wednesday, the NRA accused New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo and New York Attorney General Letitia James of targeting the organization with a lawsuit designed to weaken it in ahead of the 2020 elections.
The...
